pages.text: Mines a block from the bottom side of the pedestal (it can insta-mine obsidian)$(br)Like any other upgrade you can change the way it places by utilizing the placement angle$(br)Can be enchanted using the fortune and silk touch enchant$(br)Inserting a pickaxe into the pedestal will have it switch to using that tool instead.

The block breaker can be enchanted using the range enchant and the speed enchant$(br)The range enchant will make it that the block breaker will only break block in it's specified range, for an example in the default upgrade the block breaker will only break the block in bottom side of it but with the range enchant of level 1 it'll break the block that's 2 blocks away from it and every level will increase the range which it can break blocks in with the max range of 16 blocks for level 5, the formula is ((lvl*4)-4) for level 3 and higher.

In each level it'll break the x'th block in front of it by each level's x being 2,4,8,12,16$(br)The speed enchant will speed up the delay between it's operation,for further information please check the Enchantments tab
